languages.text: "Ни на твоей, ни на моей стезе нет места пустому милосердию". {n}Глаза Кибеллы, кажется, светятся в темноте.{/n} "Но ты выделяешь меня. Одариваешь вниманием, которого я не стою. Которое излишне. Почему?"

traits.locale_text: "Ни на твоей, ни на моей стезе нет места пустому милосердию". {n}Глаза Кибеллы, кажется, светятся в темноте.{/n} "Но ты выделяешь меня. Одариваешь вниманием, которого я не стою. Которое излишне. Почему?"

languages.text: "There is no place for idle benevolence, neither along your thread nor along mine." {n}Kibellah's eyes seem almost to glow in the dark.{/n} "Yet, you offer me attention and privileges that are both undeserved and unnecessary. Why?"
languages.original_text: "Ни на твоей, ни на моей стезе нет места пустому милосердию". {n}Глаза Кибеллы, кажется, светятся в темноте.{/n} "Но ты выделяешь меня. Одариваешь вниманием, которого я не стою. Которое излишне. Почему?"

traits.locale_text: "There is no place for idle benevolence, neither upon your way nor mine." {n}Kibellah's eyes almost seem to glow in the dark.{/n} "Yet you offer me attention and privileges that are both undeserved and unnecessary. Why?"

"There is no place for idle benevolence, neither upon your way nor mine." {n}Kibellah's eyes almost seem to glow in the dark.{/n} "Yet you offer me attention and privileges that are both undeserved and unnecessary. Why?"

"There is no place for idle benevolence, neither upon your way nor upon mine." {n}Kibellah's eyes seem almost to glow in the dark.{/n} "Yet, you offer me attention and privileges that are both undeserved and unnecessary. Why?"

"There is no place for idle benevolence, neither upon your way nor upon mine." {n}Kibellah's eyes seem almost to glow in the dark.{/n} "Yet, you offer me attention and privileges that are both undeserved and unnecessary. Why?"

"There is no place for idle benevolence, neither along your thread nor along mine." {n}Kibellah's eyes seem almost to glow in the dark.{/n} "Yet, you offer me attention and privileges that are both undeserved and unnecessary. Why?"

"There is no place for idle benevolence, neither along your thread nor along mine." {n}Kibellah's eyes seem almost to glow in the dark.{/n} "Yet, you offer me attention and privileges that are both undeserved and unnecessary. Why?"

languages.text: «No hay cabida para la benevolencia desinteresada, ni en su hilo ni en el mío». {n}Los ojos de Kibellah casi parecen brillar en la oscuridad.{/n} «Aun así, me ofrece una atención y unos privilegios tan inmerecidos como innecesarios. ¿Por qué?».
languages.original_text: "There is no place for idle benevolence, neither along your thread nor along mine." {n}Kibellah's eyes seem almost to glow in the dark.{/n} "Yet, you offer me attention and privileges that are both undeserved and unnecessary. Why?"

traits.locale_text: «No hay cabida para la benevolencia desinteresada, ni en su hilo ni en el mío». {n}Los ojos de Kibellah casi parecen brillar en la oscuridad.{/n} «Aun así, me ofrece una atención y unos privilegios tan inmerecidos como innecesarios. ¿Por qué?».

languages.text: 「あなたの糸にも、私の糸にも、無益な博愛を受け入れる余地はない」{n}暗闇の中で、キベラの目が光っているように見える。{/n}「それなのに、あなたは私に分不相応で不要な注目や特権を与えてくれる。なぜ？」
languages.original_text: "There is no place for idle benevolence, neither along your thread nor along mine." {n}Kibellah's eyes seem almost to glow in the dark.{/n} "Yet, you offer me attention and privileges that are both undeserved and unnecessary. Why?"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの糸にも、私の糸にも、無益な博愛を受け入れる余地はない」{n}暗闇の中で、キベラの目が光っているように見える。{/n}「それなのに、あなたは私に分不相応で不要な注目や特権を与えてくれる。なぜ？」

languages.text: “你我的丝线上没有任何仁慈的余地，无论是你，还是我。”{n}绮贝菈的双眼似乎在黑暗中发着光。{/n}“然而，你却赐予了我毫无必要的关注与特权，赐予了我所不配的一切。这是为什么？”
languages.original_text: "There is no place for idle benevolence, neither along your thread nor along mine." {n}Kibellah's eyes seem almost to glow in the dark.{/n} "Yet, you offer me attention and privileges that are both undeserved and unnecessary. Why?"

traits.locale_text: “你我的丝线上没有任何仁慈的余地，无论是你，还是我。”{n}绮贝菈的双眼似乎在黑暗中发着光。{/n}“然而，你却赐予了我毫无必要的关注与特权，赐予了我所不配的一切。这是为什么？”

languages.text: "Es gibt keinen Platz für müßige Nächstenliebe, weder auf Eurem Faden, noch auf meinem." {n}Kibellahs Augen scheinen in der Dunkelheit zu leuchten.{/n} "Und doch gewährt Ihr mir Aufmerksamkeit und Privilegien, die unverdient und unnötig sind. Warum?"
languages.original_text: "There is no place for idle benevolence, neither along your thread nor along mine." {n}Kibellah's eyes seem almost to glow in the dark.{/n} "Yet, you offer me attention and privileges that are both undeserved and unnecessary. Why?"

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt keinen Platz für müßige Nächstenliebe, weder auf Eurem Faden, noch auf meinem." {n}Kibellahs Augen scheinen in der Dunkelheit zu leuchten.{/n} "Und doch gewährt Ihr mir Aufmerksamkeit und Privilegien, die unverdient und unnötig sind. Warum?"

languages.text: « Il n'y a pas de place pour la bienveillance gratuite, ni le long de votre fil ni le long du mien. » {n}Les yeux de Kibellah semblent presque briller dans le noir.{/n} « Et pourtant, vous m'accordez une attention et des privilèges tout à la fois immérités et superflus. Pourquoi ? »
languages.original_text: "There is no place for idle benevolence, neither along your thread nor along mine." {n}Kibellah's eyes seem almost to glow in the dark.{/n} "Yet, you offer me attention and privileges that are both undeserved and unnecessary. Why?"

traits.locale_text: « Il n'y a pas de place pour la bienveillance gratuite, ni le long de votre fil ni le long du mien. » {n}Les yeux de Kibellah semblent presque briller dans le noir.{/n} « Et pourtant, vous m'accordez une attention et des privilèges tout à la fois immérités et superflus. Pourquoi ? »

languages.text: "Ne senin ipliğinde ne de benim ipliğimde beyhude insaniyetin yeri var." {n}Kibellah'nın gözleri, âdeta karanlıkta parlıyor.{/n} "Yine de bana dikkatini verip hem hak etmediğim hem de gerek duymadığım ayrıcalıklar sunuyorsun. Neden?"
languages.original_text: "There is no place for idle benevolence, neither along your thread nor along mine." {n}Kibellah's eyes seem almost to glow in the dark.{/n} "Yet, you offer me attention and privileges that are both undeserved and unnecessary. Why?"
